reviews.text: Great restaurant on campsite. We have had three very good meals. Price was more than reasonable. Staff are very friendly and added to the enjoyment of eating there. I would have no hesitation at returning or recommending people to go there. Thank you for great meals and fantastic service

I stayed in the camping for three nights and ate here all three days. Food was good, they show football inside or you can sit outside. My second day I was very happy with the service and chats I got from two older gentlemens, they gave such a good vibe and gave me cake and some alcohol on the house after my meal. Sweet guys and good laugh. My last day I didnt have so luck with the service, a girl in glasses need to check her attitude as she was annoyed from the moment I asked for a table for 1, had to wait 20 min and no one took my order, and had to disturb her running around and ask to order and she answered snarky. This attitude continued when I was going to pay as well. I understand you are busy, But please take a little better care of your guests, especially solo travelers! Thank you for this time, see you again ☺️

We checked the opening and closing hours published by the owner on Google Maps prior to traveling to this place only to find out they were innacurate by 30 min. Of course the manager did not accomodate us and ended up traveling all the way back to San Marino. However, the design and overall arrangement of the outdoor seating looks very nice and perhaps this would have been a nice experience.

It is a amazing restaurant!! The environment is very good and the waiters are very nice. In addition, seafood is fresh, we ordered a seafood noodles just 15 euros which gave us a lot of shrimps and shells.

Rude owner doesn't deserve to get even 1 star. Customers are your bread and butter, you throw your anger at them, you end up with no customers. I, certainly will not be driving to your restaurant tonight. Screenshot how you treat customer attached in photo.
